ContentDescription: An atmospheric transition image that signals a shift to a new topic or section. Should feel like a visual breath between major ideas.

Style.Rendering: Clean digital illustration, polished, editorial quality

ColorPalette.Treatment: Low saturation primaries with selective high-saturation accents for emphasis

CompositionNotes: Section breaks should be visually lighter than cover images. They provide a moment of rest and signal transition. Keep the center clear for a section title. Use a related but distinct visual motif from the cover to maintain deck cohesion.
